I have a YouTube channel that Im always looking for AI to help me out to make that easier. And Ive just, in the past six months, started another company called Go Green Contacts, and there were a couple really cool pieces of let me start with this way as an optometrist. I see a lot of patients that dont want to buy a years supply, or they dont want to go to daily disposable contacts, which are the healthiest option, because theyre worried about the carbon footprint. Theyre going to leave with all the plastic. So what we did is we found a couple of companies that were going to partner with. That one will allow you to bring back all of your contact lens lenses and the cases that they come in, the flat packs, and they will be totally recycled through a company called TerraCycle. And then we have another company that we pay to offset the carbon footprint when you buy them. So were really creating a negative carbon footprint when you buy contact lenses from us.
